column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The biggest knock against this place is that the beer selection is just as bad as most pizza places in Chicago.  On draft you can get miller
column3: and 312.  Very boring choices.  This is beer for people who don't really like beer
column4: but prefer water with a little beer flavor in it.  This kind of pizza just cries out for a good beer to go with it.  Some Bell's from MIchigan or schlafly from St Louis would really take this place to the next level.  I probably would have given them another star for good beer.
